snippet: As a surgeon, Dr. Carson was praised for his dedication and attention to detail, but as a candidate, he has sometimes seemed imprecise or ill informed.
abstract: Presidential contender Ben Carson, who as surgeon was known for precision and unassuming personality, has demonstrated odd ideologies and shaky grasp of fact as political candidate, highlighting paradox that confuses many; friends, colleagues and students have expressed concern that Dr Carson they know and admire is being eclipsed by novice political candidate prone to making blunders.

byline.original: By PAM BELLUCK and STEVE EDER
byline.contributor: Randy Lemmerman contributed reporting. Kitty Bennett contributed research.

lead_paragraph: As a surgeon, Dr. Carson was praised for his dedication and attention to detail, but as a candidate, he has sometimes seemed imprecise or ill informed.

headline.main: With Ben Carson, the Doctor and the Politician Can Vary Sharply
headline.print_headline: Dr. Carson’s Surgical Precision Hasn’t Followed to Campaign
